name: Universitatea Politehnica din Bucuresti
membership: UPB is member of:Conference of European Schools for Advanced Engineering Education and Research, European University Association, Agence Universitaire de la Francophonie, Von Karman Institute for Fluid Dynamics
goal: A few of UPB's objectives are: to become a top university in South-East Europe in scientifically research and also a pole of competency, knowledge and competitivity; to award an international recognition in research area; to generate novel ideas and provide basic and applied research.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Development, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
1) scientific activities agglutination in specific areas of the university in an potentially resulting high level of theoretical and applied research - Research Institute "Politehnica", while maintaining and strengthening the autonomy of research centers with significant results;
2) stimulating internal competition within the university;
3) awarding outstanding scientific (FP7, Structural Funds, H2020);
4) development of performance by raising standards of scientific research in doctoral schools from each faculty;
5) supporting the establishing of research groups in interdisciplinary areas;
6) involving top students in research groups of UPB;
